statements: DELETE FROM production_downtime_logs WHERE incident_cause = 'Machine Failure';
DELETE FROM production_downtime_logs WHERE incident_date < '2022-01-01' AND resolution NOT NULL
DELETE FROM root_causes WHERE id = 100 AND incident_id = 1;
DELETE FROM incidents WHERE cause = 'Hardware Failure' AND resolution = 'Replaced faulty hardware';
DELETE FROM causes WHERE cause = 'Human Error';
DELETE FROM resolutions WHERE incident_id IN (SELECT id FROM incidents WHERE incident_date < '2022-10-01') AND resolution LIKE '%resolved%';
DELETE FROM root_causes WHERE incident_id = 100 AND cause_id = 1;
DELETE FROM downtime_logs WHERE downtime_start > '2022-01-01' AND duration < INTERVAL '1 day';
